name: places/ChIJN7LKSSJZwokRLPqD_LdTXj0
formattedAddress: 127 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 127 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I received “A Man’s Facial” & “Microdermabrasion”  by Shanty & let me tell you I enjoyed it so much! I got my beard treated as well, legitimately felt the best. The products she used felt good on my skin, & felt them working on my face. I have sensitive skin so they didn’t leave any chemical burns. They were holistically made. I almost never do treatments for skin or nothing as this was my second facial ever, nevertheless I will most definitely will be booking with Shanty & adding this a part of my routine! Thank you!

text.text: I received “A Man’s Facial” & “Microdermabrasion”  by Shanty & let me tell you I enjoyed it so much! I got my beard treated as well, legitimately felt the best. The products she used felt good on my skin, & felt them working on my face. I have sensitive skin so they didn’t leave any chemical burns. They were holistically made. originalText.text: The facial was an amazing experience. You’re greeted by Shanty, and as you enter the suite, there's a calming inviting aura. The aroma in the suite is easy on the nose; moreover, you get to select your own music! Lay down get comfortable and get ready to relax. There’s a massage that comes with the facial! So whether you’re starting your day, or finishing it, it’s a great way to have any negative energy released. I can’t imagine going to anyone else after getting a facial here. Your skin looks and feels inviting after. No need for a filter! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I have never had such an experience as amazing and incredible as the one I just had tonight at Total Beauty Image!! Shanty is the real deal y'all. She's super friendly, passionate about her work, and extremely knowledgeable about skincare. She takes pride in providing the most unparalleled customer experience. I felt so relaxed and at ease. She sets the perfect ambiance too! Such a relaxing feeling environment. On top of chemical peels, facials, microneedling, etc, her massages are out of this world! Hurry up and book yourself an appointment! You won't regret it. Thank you, Shanty!!

text.text: I have never had such an experience as amazing and incredible as the one I just had tonight at Total Beauty Image!! Shanty is the real deal y'all. She's super friendly, passionate about her work, and extremely knowledgeable about skincare. She takes pride in providing the most unparalleled customer experience. I felt so relaxed and at ease. She sets the perfect ambiance too! Such a relaxing feeling environment. On top of chemical peels, facials, microneedling, etc, her massages are out of this world! Hurry up and book yourself an appointment! You won't regret it. Thank you, Shanty!!

originalText.text: I recently experienced a facial that surpassed all of my expectations, earning it a solid 10/10 in my books! From the moment I walked in, the ambiance was serene and inviting, immediately putting me at ease. Shanty was not only highly skilled but also incredibly attentive, taking the time to understand my skin concerns and tailor the treatment accordingly. The products used were of the highest quality, and I could feel the positive effects during and after the facial (the glowwwwww!). The entire experience was not just about skincare; it was a rejuvenating journey for the senses. I left feeling refreshed, and my skin looked A M A Z I N G. This facial sets the bar high – a perfect 10 for excellence in professionalism, ambiance, and results. I’m so thankful that I’ve found my new go to esthetician and can’t wait to be back for my next service!
